text: Futhi umphrofethi wabo wathi kubona “ngempela uMvelinqangi unithumele uSawuli ukuba abe yiNkosi. Bathi, “kungenzeka kanjani ukuthi ubukhosi kube ngobakhe ngaphezulu kwethu sibe thina sifanelwe ubukhosi ngaphezu kwakhe na? Engakaze anikezwe ngisho nengcebo na?” wathi “ngempela uMvelinqangi umkhethile ngaphezulu kwenu futhi wamandisela ulwazi nomzimba, futhi uMvelinqangi unikeza umbuso wakhe lowo amthandayo futhi uMvelinqangi wazi kabanzi
